verses.verse: God,<WH430> why have you rejected<WH2186> us forever?<WH5331> Why does your anger<WH639> smolder<WH6225> against the sheep<WH6629> of your pasture?<WH4830>

Remember<WH2142> your congregation,<WH5712> which you purchased<WH7069> of old,<WH6924> which<WH7626> you have redeemed<WH1350> to be the tribe of your inheritance;<WH5159> Mount<WH2022> Zion,<WH6726> in which you have lived.<WH7931>
Lift up<WH7311> your feet<WH6471> to the perpetual<WH5331> ruins,<WH4876> all the evil<WH7489> that the enemy<WH341> has done in the sanctuary.<WH6944>
Your adversaries<WH6887> have roared<WH7580> in the midst<WH7130> of your assembly.<WH4150> They have set up<WH7760> their standards<WH226> as signs.<WH226>
They behaved<WH3045> like men wielding<WH935> axes,<WH7134> cutting through a thicket<WH5442> of trees.<WH6086>
Now<WH3162> they break all its carved work<WH6603> down<WH1986> with hatchet<WH3781> and hammers.<WH3597>
They have<WH7971> burned<WH784> your sanctuary<WH4720> to the ground.<WH776> They have profaned<WH2490> the dwelling place<WH4908> of your Name.<WH8034>
They said<WH559> in their heart,<WH3820> "We will crush<WH3238> them completely.<WH3162>" They have burned up<WH8313> all the places<WH4150> in the land<WH776> where God was worshiped.<WH410>
We see<WH7200> no miraculous signs.<WH226> There is no longer any prophet,<WH5030> neither is there among us anyone who knows<WH3045> how long.<WH5704>
How long,<WH430> God, shall the adversary<WH6862> reproach?<WH2778> Shall the enemy<WH341> blaspheme<WH5006> your name<WH8034> forever?<WH5331>
Why do you draw<WH7725> back your hand,<WH3027> even your right hand?<WH3027> Take<WH3615> it out of<WH7130> your pocket and consume them!<WH2436>
Yet God<WH430> is my King<WH4428> of old,<WH6924> working<WH6466> salvation<WH3444> in the midst<WH7130> of the earth.<WH776>
You divided<WH6565> the sea<WH3220> by your strength.<WH5797> You broke<WH7665> the heads<WH7218> of the sea monsters<WH8577> in the waters.<WH4325>
You broke<WH7533> the heads<WH7218> of Leviathan<WH3882> in pieces.<WH5414> You gave him as food<WH3978> to people<WH5971> and desert creatures.<WH6728>
You opened<WH1234> up spring<WH4599> and stream.<WH5158> You dried up<WH3001> mighty<WH386> rivers.<WH5104>
The day<WH3117> is yours,<WH3915> the night is also yours.<WH3559> You have prepared the light<WH3974> and the sun.<WH8121>
You have set<WH5324> all the boundaries<WH1367> of the earth.<WH776> You have made<WH3335> summer<WH7019> and winter.<WH2779>
Remember<WH2142> this,<WH341> that the enemy has mocked<WH2778> you,<WH3068> Yahweh. Foolish<WH5036> people<WH5971> have blasphemed<WH5006> your name.<WH8034>
Don't<WH5414> deliver the soul<WH5315> of your dove<WH8449> to wild beasts.<WH2416> Don't<WH7911> forget the life<WH2416> of your poor<WH6041> forever.<WH5331>
Honor<WH5027> your covenant,<WH1285> for haunts<WH4285> of violence<WH2555> fill the dark<WH4285> places<WH4999> of the earth.<WH776>
Don't<WH1790> let the oppressed return<WH7725> ashamed.<WH3637> Let the poor<WH6041> and needy<WH34> praise<WH1984> your name.<WH8034>
Arise,<WH6965> God!<WH430> Plead<WH7378> your own cause.<WH7379> Remember<WH2142> how the foolish man<WH5036> mocks<WH2781> you all day.<WH3117>
Don't<WH7911> forget the voice<WH6963> of your adversaries.<WH6887> The tumult<WH7588> of those who rise up<WH6965> against you ascends<WH5927> continually.<WH8548>
